downloadTitle: Microsoft Teams with security isolation poster in PowerPoint
downloadDescription: Get the Microsoft Teams with security isolation poster as a PowerPoint slide for you to print or repurpose.
detailsSection: The Microsoft Teams with Security Isolation scenario provides detailed guidance to configure a private team in Microsoft Teams and use a unique sensitivity label to encrypt files so that only team members can decrypt them. The corresponding poster provides a visual summary of the steps and how the sensitivity label works for a file leaked from the team. This download is the poster in PowerPoint form.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk .
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.

relatedResourcesSection.title: configure a team with security isolation
